definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: He's a good lecturer as he really knows his stuff.
sentences.chinese: 他是位好讲师，因为他确实精通业务。

sentences.english: A lecturer in the English Department has recently been refused tenure .
sentences.chinese: 英语系一名讲师最近未能获得终身职位。

sentences.english: You need to be able to listen while you are writing down the important parts of the lecture.
sentences.chinese: 你需要在记好笔记的同时听讲师在讲些什么。

sentences.english: Teng Biao, a lecturer at China University of Political Science and Law, was arrested the same afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中国政法大学讲师滕彪当天下午也被逮捕。

sentences.english: Cathy YE Tissue Engineering and Bioprocessing, Oxford, lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大学，组织工程与生物加工中心，讲师。

sentences.english: Also, he spent his spare time guest-lecturing at University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 袁澍松先生还是香港理工大学的客座讲师。

sentences.english: Could you bring this note to lecture Li for me today?
sentences.chinese: 今天你能帮我把这张便条带个李讲师吗？

sentences.english: The chang college can't continue the operation, he was an outlaw the task of lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 基昌的学院无法再持续运营，他四处探问讲师的任务。

sentences.english: Take Good Notes. Try to write down everything that instructor puts on board.
sentences.chinese: 试着写下讲师在黑板上板书的。

sentences.english: Steel pipe and level by "TTT" Bakelite grips.
sentences.chinese: 钢管和水平“内部讲师”电木握把。

sentences.english: He worked as a civil servant, gold prospector, reporter, lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是一名公务员，黄金探矿者，记者，讲师。

sentences.english: He is now a guest lecturer of the Moody Bible Institute.
sentences.chinese: 他现在是慕迪圣经学院的客座讲师。

sentences.english: Watch for things the instructor emphasizes, even if just in words.
sentences.chinese: 注意你的讲师强调的东西，即使只是口头上的。

sentences.english: His research interests include Power electronics and power transmission.
sentences.chinese: 谭平安讲师，研究方向为电力电子与电力传动。

sentences.english: I. Language Instructor Christian Hein's application for change of appointment as full-time assistant professor.
sentences.chinese: 汉骏纬语言讲师改聘专任助理教授申请案，提请讨论。

sentences.english: So that they can hear her over their headsets.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过自己的耳麦听到讲师的声音。

definition: to give a lecture/to lecture on
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
school begins/give a course/teach a subject
